channel.title: Indian Farmer Protests 2020 on Vimarsh
channel.description: Recent content in Indian Farmer Protests 2020 on Vimarsh

item.title: Farmer Protests Explained â€“ The promise to increase revenue by 200%
item.description: The new farm laws promise to 2x yes you read that correctly the income{.rank-math-link} of farmers in the next 2 years by relying on the deregulation of the market. But most analysts and critics say this might not work and, in fact, the income of small to medium farmers (comprising 80% of the farmers) might reduce by upto 40%{.rank-math-link}. Which is a substantial hit. If you want to directly understand the problems click here{.
